name: bar-assistant
description: Bar Assistant is a self-hosted cocktail recipe and inventory management app designed for professional bartenders or enthusiasts. It lets users track available ingredients, manage recipes, and plan menus through a mobile-friendly UI.

features.title: Cocktail Recipes
features.description: Manage extensive cocktail recipe database. Complete mixology library

features.title: Inventory Tracking
features.description: Track available ingredients and stock levels. Know what you have

features.title: Recipe Suggestions
features.description: Find cocktails based on available ingredients. Smart recommendations

features.title: Menu Planning
features.description: Plan cocktail menus for events. Professional preparation

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive interface works on all devices. Mix anywhere

features.title: Bartender Tools
features.description: Professional features for bartenders and enthusiasts. Expert-level

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your recipe collection private. Complete control
